channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology Audio Station
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology Audio Station

item.title: CVE-2017-15888|2024-09-17T01:15:50.497Z -- synology -- synology%20audio%20station
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Custom Internet Radio List in Synology Audio Station before 6.3.0-3260 allows remote authenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the NAME parameter.
